name: DailyAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open Daily affirmations”
”Alexa, start Daily Affirmations”
”Alexa, play Daily Affirmations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily affirmations
des: Daily Affirmations skill will allow you to listen to a daily affirmation for 14 days, a positive thought to accompany you throughout the day. Affirmations, when they are realistic and practiced with persistence, can be a simple self-help tool, with the capacity to motivate, increase self-esteem and confidence, necessary elements to adopt positive changes and thus achieve the desired goals. This skill will help you remember one affirmation per day that you can incorporate into your daily routine. If you have any comments or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us at voice@pentatech.com.au
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
